page.title: 20EXOTIC FRUIT AND VEGETABLES
page.content: Mr.Sudhir Mehta is the assistant manager of an exotic fruit and vegetable pitch in Birmingham's wholesale Horticultural Market.Mr.Mehta arrives at the market at 5.00 a.m.to prepare for the arrival of his first customers at 5.30.His day is a busy one,phoning import dealers in London, Liverpool and Cardiff to arrange for truckloads of imported produce to be transported to Birmingham.Although his pitch specializes in exotic produce, they are still dependant on the sale of local produce from the Vale of Evesham for the bulk of their business.However, there has been a considerable increase in demand for exotic produce over the past five years,partly due to the increasing numbers of holidaymakers travelling abroad,and also due to the high immigrant population in the city.
